message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $160 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I can't quite go down to $160, I could meet you halfway at $180. This is a very fair offer considering the value this product brings.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $170 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
